title: UDEMY LEARN MIND MAPS WITH FREEMIND TUTORIAL kEISO[CT]
description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/hFUUzeZ.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][b]Thanks for looking into this course! I hope you will[/b][/center] 
[center][b]join, it is about mind maps, and they're very[/b][/center] 
[center][b]important. Traditional ways of writing down[/b[/center]] 
[center][color=red][i][b] information or keeping notes is boring (really,your brain doesn't like that), and mind maps can help improve just about every way of thinking![/b][/i][/color][/center] 
 [center][color=blue][b]This course will teach you how to use FreeMind, it's a free 
mind mapping software available on all computers. You will learn 
 how to brainstorm, make decisions, learning, organizing, and 
problem solving with mind maps. You will see that you can put any
and all of your thoughts down as a mind map![/b][/color][/center]
[center]Course Description
[b]This is an exciting, over-the-shoulder training course that allows you to discover how to use mind maps and enjoy mind mapping.[/b] 
[color=red][b]This course will walk you through:[/b][/color]
[b]How to speed up all your learning (and teaching!) in 5 simple steps[/b]
[b]How to radically increase memory when using simple mind maps[/b]
[b]How to "kill" procrastination and never feel the urge to put off work...ever again[/b]
[b]Why great minds like Leonardo DaVinci and Albert Einstein used mind maps[/b]
[b]How completed mind maps are often more useful than "doing" mindmapping[/b]
[b]How to learn and remember anything in five steps... learning, fast-and-furious![/b]
[b]How to ALWAYS be the one person in the room who thinks outside the box
[/b]
[color=purple][b]What are the requirements?[/b][/color]
[color=green][b]A willingness to learn![/b][/color]
[size=150][b]What am I going to get from this course?[/b][/size]
[b]Over 27 lectures and 6 hours of content[/b]!
[b]In this course, you will learn how to effectively use Mind Maps and learn the art of Mind Mapping[/b]
[b]Discover how mind mapping can help your learning, memory, and even the ability to make more money![/b]
[b]Learn new ways of using mind maps that make you the "smartest person in the room!"[/b]
[b]Discover how mind mapping can help your learning![/b]
[size=150][b]What is the target audience?[/b][/size]
[b]This course is intended for anyone who wants to learn the art of Mind Mapping[/b]
[/center]
